I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/getmoto/moto.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use an official Python runtime as a parent image
FROM python:3.9

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install dependencies
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements-dev.txt

# Install any additional test requirements if applicable
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements-tests.txt

# Ensure make is installed for running make commands
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y make && \
    apt-get clean

# Run the initialization to install all necessary dependencies
RUN make init

# Finally, run the test suite to verify everything is set up correctly
RUN make test
